mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_NUMBER, PROVINCE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_STORE (ID, COMPANY_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_NUMBER, PROVINCE_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into SYS_STORE
ID,
COMPANY_ID,
CITY_ID,
AREA_ID,
STORE_NAME,
STORE_NUMBER,
PROVINCE_ID,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{storeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update SYS_STORE
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NUMBER = #{storeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_STORE set COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_NUMBER = #{storeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT SYS_STORE.ID id, SYS_STORE.STORE_NUMBER text FROM SYS_STORE WHERE SYS_STORE.AREA_ID=#{areaID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SYS_ROLES.ROLE_ID id, SYS_ROLES.ROLE_DESC text FROM SYS_ROLES_SYS_STORE JOIN SYS_ROLES ON SYS_ROLES_SYS_STORE.ROLE_ID = SYS_ROLES.ROLE_ID JOIN SYS_STORE ON SYS_ROLES_SYS_STORE.STORE_ID = SYS_STORE.ID WHERE SYS_STORE.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
